name: .WIF File Extension
summary: Learn about .WIF files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A WIF file is a pattern file saved in the Weaving Interchange Format (WIF) and used by WeaveIt software. It contains a draft pattern of a weave which consists of cells that can be used to mark positions and fill with color.

content: WeaveIt programs allows you to design drafts of weaves. They use the WIF format to save and load patterns. The format allows you to easily share patterns across different computers and iOS mobile devices using different WeaveIt programs to open the format.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
